newAbilities.description: Luffy pumps his blood at incredible speeds, using his rubber body's elasticity to increase blood flow throughout his system. This enhances his speed and power dramatically.
newAbilities.significance: First major transformation technique using the Gomu Gomu no Mi, representing a creative new application of the fruit's rubber properties.

keyMoments.title: Gear 2 Unveiled
keyMoments.description: Luffy reveals Gear 2, a technique that uses his rubber body to pump blood at superhuman speeds.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Devil Fruit users can develop creative new applications of their powers through training and innovation.
